评论详情: I was pleasantly impressed with the comfort and style of this zip up sweatshirt. Fits perfectly and the burgundy shade is complimentary to my skin tone. The collar lies flat. Hope I find a matching tee!
Love this jacket. I bought the blue and it is gorgeous with the satin trim
I really like this, it is sized right and looks nice.

评论概述: Best gift for the money. Classy and comfortable!
评论详情: This jacket is perfect for all seasons.  The gold zipper makes it charming. Easy to pack and wash. Definitely recommend!!

The item I received was clearly used. There is a USED band-aid and band-aid wrapper in the pocket but hanging out well enough to see. As soon as I unfolded it, I saw it. There is long hair on it and dirt/stains. VERY disappointing!! I am returning tomorrow, along with the band-aid and wrapper!
Love love love this sweatshirt. So soft. Buy it now you won’t be disappointed.

Doesn’t look or feel like a typical sweatshirt. I got the brown and the Zipper is gold with a satin trim. 2 pockets add to it being unique  The fit is roomy the way I like it so I can wear something thick underneath if it’s cold. Light enough for warm weather at night.
This is a beautiful jacket. Very well-made. Looks super elegant.
I love this jacket!  It’s a nice material and fits very nicely.  It’s a fancy sweatshirt but can be worn casual as well.  I really like the gold zipper. It’s washed and dried with no issues.

I purchased black sweatshirt and it was pictured with silver zipper online. It came with yellow (gold) zipper. Although of good quality, it does not look good, or I just don’t like gold on black… Unfortunately I don’t trust the seller for the right replacement, so will be returning it.
This jacket has a lovely and material, but it is not workable for me. I have a short neck and the large collar is unattractive. The very noticeable zipper accentuates the collar. I have returned it.

The color “khaki” is actually a very pale pink, not even close to the color pictured. Also, the zipper is VERY SHINY GOLD. The overall look is quite bling-y and not what I was expecting so it’s going back. It also runs narrow and longer than expected. I normally wear an XL but if I reordered another color I’d probably size up to an XXL. Not sure if I will, though, as I really don’t like the gold zipper and I’m not sure if the photos accurately show the color of the zipper I’d be getting with the other colors. The fabric is nice and soft, I just wish I liked the style better.
this is a nice zippered very, very light jacket. It does run too big, but i kept it. It’s cute.
Beautiful unique jacket but runs big. I usually wear a M or L, and ended up with a S. 38D for size reference
Love the material. Stretchy yet elegant looking.  Very pleased.
Great fit, very stylish. The material is soft. Great color on me

All the 5 star positive reviews were accurate.  Very nice material,  great quality overall, not scratchy. Zipper works each time! Professional or casual style. I got it in black. Ordered a M based on reviews that it runs slightly big. I usually wear a L or XL. Fits perfect.
Very Good quality! Fits true to size and very comfortable! Color is more of a brick red color than burgundy with a gold zipper. Can't beat the price!

I bought this in white and I love it. The details are so nice such as satin trim at each side of front zipper, the pockets, zippers that zip from top down and bottom up, plus the fabric weight and feel are dreamy soft! This will not be for warmth but I wanted it as a lightweight jacket that is so comfy but elevated style. I will likely buy in another color!
Very nice soft material great price

I bought this because I thought it would be sweatshirt material.  It is not.  Still lovely, though.  I bought a M.  It fits fine except around the hips - & I am not hippy.  If you want more room in the hip area, I suggest sizing up.  This is well made & I have already washed it because I wash all new clothes.  Came out great.  I followed the washing directions.
Looks good, pleasant material, loose fit. I am 154 lb and L size a bit big.

I was searching for a new white sweatshirt and stumbled on this beautiful jacket. I didn’t really know what to think, but the reviews were good, so I went for it. This is one of the finest items I have every purchased online!! It’s soft, classy, fits amazing …. It’s so outstanding that I’m going to look for more colors that I can order right away!!

评论概述: This is a great quality, Varley Roxbury sweatshirt cardi-DUPE.
评论详情: Got it in Black, white, and grey. Sent back the Khaki because the color wasn't the perfect khaki color that flatters my complexion. Great material. Nice, medium weight for layering aprés gym or tennis match. Love the satin trim. Good, solid hardware. I am a diehard, Varley fan girl despite their exorbitant pricing, so I promise this cardi won't disappoint. I live in the UK and was home in the US trolling on Amazon.com bc the US site just has better quality and range of things than the UK site.  I took an S and it fits perfectly (5'3, 125lbs). I prefer a bit loose for leisurewear and this size was perfect.
It washes really nicely and it is very soft

This is such a cute sweatshirt.  I love the extra touches that make it a bit dressy, like the gold zipper and ribbon detail.  You can easily dress down w/ joggers and sneakers or up it a bit with slacks & flats.  So glad I bought.  Runs true to size.  I'm 5'8, 135 and Medium works well for me since I don't like things tight.

I love the look & fit of this. It feels like a sweatshirt but looks like a nice jacket.  The fabric is soft and smooth- day 1 of wearing and its not showing any signs of of getting nubby.  I would love if the sleeves were a bit longer but I have long arms.
This is a very very nice sweatshirt. You almost can’t say it’s a sweatshirt because it’s very classy and nice looking. The insight is soft. I just can’t say enough about it. Really nice.

I was hesitant on spending $40 on a sweatshirt/jacket from Amazon. I am pleasantly surprised. I love it! The fabric is quality, soft and feels great on. I wear a medium and sometimes a large. 5’2 160. Medium fits nicely and is flattering.
True to size and comfort.
Returned because it was small fitting especially in the hip area

评论概述: An exemplary blend of comfort and sophistication
评论详情: Upon receiving the Fisoew Women's Zip-Up Sweatshirt, I was immediately struck by its exceptional quality and design. This garment is far from an ordinary sweatshirt, boasting an exquisite blend of comfort and elegance.  The attention to detail is evident throughout. The silky lining surrounding the zipper adds a touch of luxury, elevating the sweatshirt's aesthetic appeal. The collar and zip-up front lend a sophisticated touch, allowing it to dress up or down easily.  The sweatshirt's fabric is surprisingly soft and lightweight, providing warmth and comfort. It drapes beautifully, creating a flattering silhouette that complements any body type. The deep pockets offer ample storage space, making it practical for everyday use.  The sweatshirt's construction is impeccable, with solid seams and high-quality materials ensuring durability. The color options are versatile and complement various skin tones and personal styles.  In conclusion, the Fisoew Women's Zip-Up Sweatshirt exceeds expectations and deserves the highest praise. It is a versatile and stylish garment that combines the comfort of a sweatshirt with the elegance of a dressy jacket. Whether paired with jeans or a skirt, this sweatshirt will effortlessly elevate any outfit. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a luxurious and comfortable addition to their wardrobe.

Color is a beautiful periwinkle. Looks exactly like the pictures. Gives me 90’s vibes because of the style. Silky smooth on skin. The zipper is gold I do think silver would’ve been better. Dressy casual zip up.

I could not be happier with this jacket! I absolutely love everything about it! The quality is exceptional and the material is super comfortable. It fits true to size with an extremely flattering silhouette. I love the double zipper that unzips from the top or the bottom. The material doesn’t fade or shrink after washing. My favorite thing about this jacket, though, is how versatile it is. It looks great with jeans, but also looks great dressed up with the right accessories. The affordable price tag is a nice bonus. Highly recommend!

评论概述: This is a very well made garment
评论详情: I got this for my wife. She really likes that it has the double zip up/down effect. It's made well, is a little more chic than the usual zip hoodie as the material is a nice blend. I got the color black for her, in size M, it looks very nice on her. So far, no complaints...washes well she said. This is a good price too for a nicer piece of casual outerwear.

Love this Sweatshirt with class.  It really doesn't even look like a sweatshirt.  Bought this for an upcoming Cruise.  I wanted something versatile that I could wear casually or even to dinner in the evening.  This will fit the bill.  The gold two way zipper is a nice touch and added feature. I sized down and it fits perfectly.  It won't wrinkle much if at all in my suitcase..what I bonus!  I would love to own one in every color.

This jacket, an S on my 5’1” frame is a winner.  I love the gold metal zipper (which isn’t  painted gold nylon).  This adds luxe and dresses up the jacket which is described as sweat wear.  You could pair this with jeans or even loose trousers like I did for different occasions.The collar is a tad high on me when zipped.  Not a deal breaker.  At current price of 35 bucks, this jacket is worth considering.  Five Stars

Nice quality, hard to call this a sweatshirt as it looks and feels far more posh than what you'd expect from a sweatshirt.  Great for having a cozy feel while looking polished.  Perhaps you're not into blazers- style this for a comfy office look.  Fits true to size.  I really like that the zipper can be unzipped at the bottom, easy to create a faux tailored look.
Very Pretty, accent jacket, unique, good quality

I do a lot of layering, since I'm frequently cold, but wasn't sure about this even when I ordered. The satin strip down the front was off putting, to me. However, it looks great. I ordered larger since I'm so tired of getting "made in china" items from here that are too small. This I'd llnice and loose, though. I am so glad I got ot oversized, because I like how it drapesbso well, and kind of grazes my body. It looks really flattering. I'm okay with the satin strip and flashy gold zipper. The zipper is not smooth, though. I'll run some soap over it, mb that will help.  Great jacket. I live how there is no hood. It is thin, though...no inside fleece.

This is a nice, casual jacket with a bit of an elevated look due to the gold zippers, the lining around the zippers, and cute front pockets. The double zipper also gives it a unique look, along with the funnel neck collar. It is comfortable, soft, runs true to size, and is the perfect lightweight transitional jacket. It looks cute open or zipped up, and is great for working out, running errands, or lounging around the house.
This is a really great jacket. Soft comfortable material and looks really chic. Fits well

This jacket couldn't have come at a better time.  I came home from shopping and realized it was colder out than I thought, so I opened this up and put it on.  I love it!  I needed a classier casual jacket to wear when I was going out to dinner or going out with friends, so I ordered this one because of the black with the gold zipper.  It did not disappoint.  The gold with the black really makes it a dressier jacket even though it has sweatshirt like cuffs and waistband.  It is super soft and comfortable.  It is made of a material mix of polyester, rayon and spandex and feels so good against your skin.  I think it's meant to be a shorter jacket, but it fits a little longer on me.  I'm 5'1" and weigh 135 lbs., so everything is a little longer on me :) I usually wear a small and that's what I ordered.  It fit as expected, even when zipped up.  You can never rely on the size charts, and their size chart is way off. I would go with the size you normally wear.  I am currently wearing it with shorts, but it would also look great with jeans or even some dressier khakis or black pants.  Another great feature is the pockets.  The are square pockets with flaps at the top.  Since they're not angled, you don't need a zipper to make sure your things don't fall out.  You just slip your phone, credit cards, money, keys, etc. in the pocket and make sure the flap is down and your things will stay put.  My only complaint is the zipper operation.  It works great until you get to the waistband.  It seems to catch at the waistband, so I have to pull it out a little to get past the inside material.  Then it slides right past.  Not a huge problem, but it is a little bit of a pain if you're trying to get out of the jacket quickly.  The zipper does work both ways (both up and down), so you could have it unzipped at the top and unzipped at the bottom to give it a little different look.  It's really cute, even for this 58-year-old, and I highly recommend it.
